question: Which is the cellular target of gefitinib?
ideal_answer: The specific cellular target of Gefitinib (Iressa) is the epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR).

snippets.text: Gefitinib, the specific inhibitor of the epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR), may cause growth delay in cancer cell lines.
Gefitinib (Iressa) is a specific and effective epidermal growth factor receptor inhibitor.
Gefitinib is a specific inhibitor of the epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR) that causes growth delay in cancer cell lines and human tumor xenografts expressing high levels of EGFR.
